author: Xbox
description:
Earn the Number.
In 007 First Light, play as James Bond, a young, resourceful, and sometimes reckless new recruit, and discover an origin story for the first time. An all-new game experience from IO Interactive, coming in 2026.

#007FirstLight #EarnTheNumber

author: Xbox
description:
Try the demo of MIO: Memories in Orbit now 
 
Battle your way through the vast and ominous environments of the Vessel to uncover the truth behind MIO’s past! 🪐
 
Enhance your fighting skills, customize Mio’s abilities and adapt your strategy to a vast array of deadly foes. Be prepared for uncompromising challenges! 
 
Wishlist Now on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/mio-memories-in-orbit/9np86k57sqm3

author: Xbox
description:
No Man's Sky Beacon ushers in a huge overhaul of planetary settlements. 

Become the mayor of multiple conurbations across the universe, including the huge new robot towns. Nurture your citizens, resolve disputes and optimize their productivity. Defend them from attack by joining your squadron in close quarters ship combat. Beacon is free to download today for existing Xbox and Game Pass players from today.

https://www.microsoft.com/p/no-mans-sky/bqvqtl3pch05#activetab=pivot:overviewtab

author: Xbox
description:
Philemon is ready to bring the music back to the world of Symphonia. Are you?

Awaken a musical realm in this poetic platformer. In Symphonia, you'll use the power of your violin coupled with your platforming skills to gather an orchestra to bring the musical machinery of the world back to life!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/symphonia/9NBLHDB0WLHZ
